content.p: As a newly qualified nurse or midwife your degree will open up a world of career opportunities.There has never been a more exciting time to be in nursing or midwifery and we're pleased to have offered this event as an opportunity for you to discover the pathways open to you. Our fair gave you the opportunity: This fair has now finished. Below you can find a list of the employers that attended and follow links to their current vacancies. telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
